alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Early; Lee; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 2:48PM EDT until April 05 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN DALE...SOUTHERN HENRY AND NORTHWESTERN HOUSTON COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN ALABAMA...CLAY... RANDOLPH...NORTHWESTERN LEE...NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN...NORTHWESTERN EARLY AND TERRELL COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA... At 246 PM EDT/146 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dawson to near Taylor, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Headland, Dothan, Dawson, Cuthbert, Blakely, Midland City, Kinsey, Edison, Newton, Webb, Shellman, Columbia, Pinckard, Smithville, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Newville and Napier Field. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/ for southeastern Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Clay; Early; Lee; Randolph; Terrell
